mapper.insert: insert into movie ( mov_name, mov_description, mov_type, mov_status, mov_last_time, mov_director, mov_core, mov_release_time, mov_actor, mov_is_come, mov_is_hot, mov_image, mov_photos, mov_area, creat_time, update_time) values (#{movName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{movStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{movLastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{movDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movCore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{movReleaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{movActor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movIsCome,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{movIsHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{movImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movPhotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update movie set mov_name = #{movName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mov_description = #{movDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mov_type = #{movType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mov_status = #{movStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mov_last_time = #{movLastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mov_director = #{movDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mov_core = #{movCore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, mov_release_time = #{movReleaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mov_actor = #{movActor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mov_is_come = #{movIsCome,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mov_is_hot = #{movIsHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mov_image = #{movImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mov_photos = #{movPhotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mov_area = #{movArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where mov_id = #{movId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mov_id, mov_name, mov_description, mov_type, mov_status, mov_last_time, mov_director, mov_core, mov_release_time, mov_actor, mov_is_come, mov_is_hot, mov_image, mov_photos, mov_area, creat_time, update_time from movie where mov_id = #{movId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mov_id, mov_name, mov_description, mov_type, mov_status, mov_last_time, mov_director, mov_core, mov_release_time, mov_actor, mov_is_come, mov_is_hot, mov_image, mov_photos, mov_area, creat_time, update_time from movie
